sections.description: A toolkit for integrating various Generative AI services into the WordPress content workflow.
sections.changelog:
v2.7.2

  • fix(core): Prevent fatal error on activation by deferring updater and multisite checks to the `admin_init` hook.

v2.7.1

  • fix(multisite): Add full support for WordPress multisite networks, ensuring the updater works correctly.

v2.7.0

  • refactor(core): Separate AI providers into dedicated classes for better maintainability.
  • feat(openai): Integrate DALL-E 3 as an image generation provider.

v2.6.2

  • fix(updater): Correct slug generation and implement plugins_api filter to resolve 'plugin not found' errors during update.

v2.6.1

  • fix(updater): Resolve fatal error and translation loading issues during update checks.

v2.6.0

  • feat(a11y): Automatically set alt text for generated images using the post title.

v2.5.0

  • refactor(core): Removed all image optimization functionality to focus on core AI features.
